title: Splendid Ice Cream Desserts by Jeni Britton Bauer
description:
In JeniÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Splendid Ice Cream Desserts, ice creams deliciously melt into hot brown Bettys, berry cobblers, sweet empanadas, and corn fritters. Her one-of-a-kind cakes and cookies are not only served with ice cream, they get crumbled on top and incorporated into the ice cream base itself.
Sundae combinations dazzle with bold and inspired sauces, such as Whiskey Caramel and Honey Spiked with Chilies. And JeniÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s crunchy Ã¢â‚¬Å“gravelsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (crumbly sundae toppings)Ã¢â‚¬â€such as Salty Graham Gravel and Everything Bagel GravelÃ¢â‚¬â€are unlike toppings anyone has ever seen before.
Store-bought ice cream can be used for all the desserts in the book, but it will be hard to resist JeniÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s breakthrough recipes for dairy-free ice cream, frozen custard, and soft-serve.
